the line \\\"Cc\\\": the Employee is to indicate those who are to be informed as well and who are not expected to answe In case of received messages, the receiver listed in is not required to answer to the questions and issues raised in the mail message; such an addressee shall follow the communication and wait until the originally addressed persons will provide their answer\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"It is not recommended to mix addressees from different companies or organizations (except EPAM) in the lines \\\"To:\\\" and \\\"Cc:\\\" - to avoid the leakage of informatio Use this with extra Format→Encoding→Cyrillic(Windows).\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All Employees have to use the standard corporate complimentary close and signature block in their business correspondenc The corporate complimentary close and signature block are obligatory for the external correspondenc Regarding the reply and forward messages, the usage of the corporate complimentary close and signature block is optional and is a matter of personal preferenc The Company's local offices may also use the similar signature in the native language for external communication in the local marke\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Business Conversation Follow 176)\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Any technical or business decisions made during meetings, verbal conversations or telephone calls must be recorded in the form of a letter (letters) and brought to the notice of the Employees affected by the decision(s). A meeting (call) organizer is responsible for an appropriate written summary. The letter is to be created in compliance with the rules defined below. The Subject of the letter is to start with the abbreviation \\\"MFU\\\", which stands for \\\"Meeting follow-up\\\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/72550aff-6479-421b-af8d-97bb91524fcc/image2019-12-11_14-59-14.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":428,\"height\":108}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"For correct document circulation and convenience of correspondence, there is a set of distribution lists in Outlook. These DLs are united into groups forming the EPAM Global Address List and can be seen in the Outlook Address book in the dropdown list \\\"Show Names from the\\\". The most important are:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"ordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Workflow\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" - all groups involved in the working process of the Compan\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All DLs from the Workflow section are named by the following principle. It is depicted by the ending of the DL's name: BUD - Budapest, MSK - Moscow, MSQ - Minsk (sometimes is extended to Belarus), PCT - Princeton, SPB - Saint Petersburg, BY - Belarus, HU - Hungary, RU - Russia, UK - United Kingdom, and some other locations clear from their titles.\\n\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Note!\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" When writing to the Workflow DLs it is required to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"reasonably minimize\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" the audience you are writing to. For example, if there is a division by offices for the necessary DL it is required to write to the DL corresponding to your office only.\\nThe basic distribution lists which can become necessary from the first working days You can chat, make audio and video calls inside and outside the company as well as schedule, join, and conduct Skype for Business person-to-person and conference meetings.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"General Rules of Instant Messaging\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(26, 156, 176)\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Do not use the IM for decision making or management related communication.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In case when a decision is taken on such a channel the discussion shall be routed to a proper communication channel (workshop, meeting, e-mail) and the decision shall be documented properly.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Message logging is mandatory.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Never forget that the opposite party is distracted from his work while communicating with you on IM. Therefore please limit the communication to the possible minimum.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"IM usage is totally dedicated to business-related communication during working hours. Do not use it for private chatting.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"IM shall only be used when urgent information or feedback is needed from the counterparty.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Do not send long descriptions via IM.
